channel.title: Oprah v2 - Delta || Need a development team [317] - PAUSED!
channel.description:
[b][i][u][size=24pt]NOTICE: tHE PROJECT IS PAUSED, BECAUSE I HAVE TO COMPLETE A VERY IMPORTANT JOB![/size][/u][/i][/b]
[b]Hey guys![/b] As I said, I will start the v2 of Oprah in the summer holiday. And now I'm gonna get it started, but I will need a development team first. After the holiday may I host the server as a beta stage to see how its going. I will also try to keep the server up 24/7. But get to my plans. Here is a list of the most important items we would need to add:
[ul][li]Santa hat[/li] [li]Full bandos[/li] [li]Full Armadyl[/li] [li]Full sammy[/li] [li]Full sara[/li] [li]All spirit shields[/li] [li]All godswords[/li] [li]Dragon Claws[/li] [li]All potions[/li] [li]All partyhats[/li][/ul]
^ [b]MORE STUFF COMMING LATER.[/b]
I will mark everything thats done as fast as possible. Here goes the list with the first skills I want to be done:
[ul][li]Farming[/li] [li]Herbloring[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li][/ul]
^ [b]MORE SKILLS WILL BE ADDED LATER.[/b]
[hr] Click on "Oprah" to see what base we are gonna use [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540179.0.html[/url][B]Oprah[/B] [hr]
[b][i]Wanna apply as server or client developer? Use the forum under:[/i][/b]
[code]Name: Age: Msn or skype: if you rated your self what would you give your self out of 10: Proof of work: Why do you want to become a part of the team?:[/code]
[b]Development team:[/b]
[ul][li]Neroxx - Server & Client[/li] [li]Josh - Server sided[/li] [li]Enzo42[/li][/ul]

item.title: Oprah v2 - Delta || Need a development team [317] - PAUSED!
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

Sorry for not replying, but I have been on holiday. I drove through 5 countries… I’m back now, I just have to sleep a little bit xD

Read full topic

[quote=“gears2011, post:2, topic:449368”]Name: josh
Age: 16
Msn or skype: josh.magee5 or yoshi1975@live.com.au
if you rated your self what would you give your self out of 10: by coding 9/10? maturity 10/10
Proof of work: worked on ballscape (developer), part-time for Uncalled Attack and former server ( Blehscape (2007))
Why do you want to become a part of the team?: to help and be apart of a new uprising server.

please consider my application.
regards, Josh.[/quote] Worked for ballscape? babablksheep is 18 LOL and he made ballscape on his own

Read full topic

@neroxx wrote:

[size=24pt]NOTICE: tHE PROJECT IS PAUSED, BECAUSE I HAVE TO COMPLETE A VERY IMPORTANT JOB![/size]

Hey guys! As I said, I will start the v2 of Oprah in the summer holiday. And now I’m gonna get it started, but I will need a development team first. After the holiday may I host the server as a beta stage to see how its going. I will also try to keep the server up 24/7. But get to my plans. Here is a list of the most important items we would need to add:

[ul][li]Santa hat[/li]
[li]Full bandos[/li]
[li]Full Armadyl[/li]
[li]Full sammy[/li]
[li]Full sara[/li]
[li]All spirit shields[/li]
[li]All godswords[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws[/li]
[li]All potions[/li]
[li]All partyhats[/li][/ul]

^
MORE STUFF COMMING LATER.

I will mark everything thats done as fast as possible. Here goes the list with the first skills I want to be done:

[ul][li]Farming[/li]
[li]Herbloring[/li]
[li]Fishing[/li]
[li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Firemaking[/li][/ul]

^
MORE SKILLS WILL BE ADDED LATER.

[hr]
Click on “Oprah” to see what base we are gonna use [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540179.0.html[/url]Oprah
